text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Ah! McQueen-san, you're back!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san! Great job!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You all came all this way to see me?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Just barely second place, huh? Still a great match though.
choice_data_list: Your competitor today was really something, huh?
Your competitor today was really something, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, there is no doubt about that. I had perfect coordination and I was able to stay concentrated when it mattered most.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Today, I was simply outmatched.
You're looking completely refreshed, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's because that race taught me so many things. Like what I am currently lacking, and what I need to develop for the future.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've learned so many things from this race alone. Moreover…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Moreover?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Unlike the Japan Cup, today I am happy with how I ran today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I was able to turn the expectations that you all had for me into my own power/strength, allowing me to run with all my might.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san, you're going to do great in the next race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course I will.

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I believe in you, Ace!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: You're going to show us another amazing race, aren't you, McQueen-chan!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'll show you all a race that will live up to the title of “Ace.”

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alrighty then! Now that the race's over, Trainer's gonna treat us to dinner!
Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!
Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I mentioned it, did I not…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've been on a restrictive diet in preparation for today's race, so I'm quite famished.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I guess we'll be teaching you a harsh lesson on how insatiable our appetites really are.
Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right! Why don't we invite Oguri and Ryan as well!
Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet won't be able to survive this!
Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet won't be able to survive this!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Don't be so stingy! Anyways, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, let's go, Trainer-san!
The team that was born from Oguri Cap's miracle during the Arima Kinen: Team Sirius…
Its new trainer and its new ace clumsily made their way through races and eventually formed a proper team.
We still have a long way to go to be as great as we once were, but…
The values and ideas that we inherited from the former members of our team continue to resonate between us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone, I'm heading out.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: You can do this, Ace!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Remember, if you manage to keep your title, Trainer'll treat you to as many sweets as you'd like!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wait, really!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: You weren't supposed to tell her that yet! She's going to lose her concentration because of that!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Figured it'd help get her fired up, but I guess it had the opposite effect, huh?

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ace, concentrate… concentrate!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Y-You're right. Concentrate… Concentrate… Confectionaries…
McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.
McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.
Judging from her prior races, her strength is the real deal. Moreover, she's predicted to win this race as well.
But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!
But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, leave it to me. With all of you by my side and pushing me forward, I feel like I can accomplish anything!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you, I will definitely win this race!
(Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Mejiro McQueen! Mejiro McQueen! She's created a 3 horse-length lead!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Mejiro McQueen crosses the finish line in first place!! She is the first Uma Musume to win the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row!
(Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Congrats, McQueen-san!!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Oohh! I'm so moved!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Our Ace… She really is something special, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will continue to carry our dreams forward!
